Episodes.Title: The Pandemic Special
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Randy comes to terms with his role in the COVID-19 outbreak as the pandemic presents challenges to the citizens of South Park. The kids happily return to school, but nothing resembles the normal they once knew.

Episodes.Title: South ParQ Vaccination Special
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: The citizens of South ParQ are clamoring for the COVID-19 vaccine. A hilarious new militant group tries to stop the boys from getting their teacher vaccinated.

Episodes.Title: Post COVID
Episodes.Writer: Brian Graden, Trey Parker, Matt Stone
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived but will never be the same Post Covid.

Episodes.Title: South Park: Post COVID
Episodes.Writer: Brian Graden, Trey Parker, Matt Stone
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny survived, but will never be the same Post-COVID.

Episodes.Title: South Park: Post Covid
Episodes.Writer: Brian Graden, Trey Parker, Matt Stone

Episodes.Plot: What happened to the children who lived through the Pandemic? Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny survived but will never be the same Post Covid.

Episodes.Title: South Park: Post Covid: The Return of Covid
Post Covid - The Return of Covid
Episodes.Writer: Brian Graden, Trey Parker, Matt Stone
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: If Stan, Kyle and Cartman could just work together, they could go back in time to make sure Covid never happened and save Kenny's life. Traveling back to the past seems to be the easy answer until they meet Victor Chaos.
